name: AnandTech Forums vBulletin Style
description: Makes the new XenForo forums (currently only posts) look a lot like stock vBulletin.
additional_info:
v0.8.1 Fixed some bugs with the breadcrumbs and alerts.

v0.9.0 Lots of changes, mainly to thread listings and quotes.

v1.0 Bugfixes, particularly to mobile issues; added posted-in-thread indicator.

v1.1 More bugfixes, particularly to mobile issues; moved thread lock indicator to the left at desktop size.

v1.2 Bugfixes for bugs introduced by new Xenforo versions.

v2.0a1 A rewrite for Xenforo 2.0, almost exclusively for posts so far.

v2.0a2 Fixes for the mid-December changes.

v2.1 2020 updates
